Class BoardSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • BoardSolver

  • public class BoardSolver
extends java.lang.Object
    Solves a Connect-4 Position using the negamax algorithm with alpha beta pruning and transposition tables
    Version:
    May 13, 2021
    Author:
    Neil Kakhandiki

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BoardSolver()
      Create a new BoardSolver object with a transposition table

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int negamax(BitBoard board, int alpha, int beta)
      Returns the score of a given board position using the negamax algorithm with alpha beta pruning and transposition tables
      int solve(BitBoard board)
      Returns the best column to play, by calling negamax() to get the score of each possible move played

    • Method Detail

      • negamax

        public int negamax(BitBoard board,
                   int alpha,
                   int beta)
        Returns the score of a given board position using the negamax algorithm with alpha beta pruning and transposition tables
        Parameters:
        board - position
        alpha - lower bound
        beta - upper bound
        Returns:
        the score of a board position

      • solve

        public int solve(BitBoard board)
        Returns the best column to play, by calling negamax() to get the score of each possible move played
        Parameters:
        board - position
        Returns:
        bestCol of position
